response.job_title: SRE | MLOps | DevOps | Machine Learning Engineering | Software Engineering |
response.summary: Machine learning engineer (MLOps), Software Engineer (DevOps). I am passionate about Software development, Data Science, AI, and Machine Learning, strong analytical skills to help companies succeed by allowing them to develop strategic plans based on tech solutions. Certified as a data scientist from correlation one. Fluent in English.
response.skills: Computer Science, Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery (CI/CD), Business Intelligence (BI), Data Architecture, Scrum, Google Data Studio, Code Review, MLflow, DevOps, Microsoft Office, Data Analysis, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning, Data Science, Software Development, Python (Programming Language), JavaScript, C++, Matlab, SolidWorks

profile_positions.description:
- Implement and maintain observability, monitoring and alerting systems to identify issues and bottlenecks.
- Develop and maintain scripts, tools, and automation to manage infrastructure and deployments.
- Implement configuration management and infrastructure as code (IaC) practices.
- Analyze system and application performance, identify performance bottlenecks, and optimize performance.
- Manage deployment pipelines, continuous integration, and continuous deployment processes.
- Implement security best practices for infrastructure, applications, and data.
profile_positions.title: Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
- Deploy, maintain and monitor machine learning models in production.
- Help to maintain Data Warehouses.
- Build data pipelines to automate machine learning tasks.
- Deploy the necessary cloud infrastructure for machine learning products.
- Write, package and deploy APIs for consumption of AI ML models using python frameworks.
- Ensure continuous integration and deployment of machine learning solutions following CI/CD
techniques.
- Design and implement data architecture for machine learning solutions.
- Plan, write and implement test cases, unit, and integration tests for machine learning products.
- Code review
- Develop products following the agile philosophy and the SCRUM framework.
- Develop MLOps solutions in GCP.
profile_positions.title: Machine Learing Ops Engineer (MLOps)
